title: Dynamic queue is the worst thing Riot has ever forced on its playerbase.
body: Why, as a soloq player, do I have to deal with 100% 4 and 3 queues in ranked. Where's my soloQ anymore? This new queue type is literally giving me cancer. I can feel it eating away at my soul as I'm typing this. If I don't respond, it's cause I'm in the hospital for my first session of chemotherapy.

Let's stop beating around the bush already.  Sona is in the bottom 1/3 of pickrates in Yolo Queue and the only reason she isn't the absolute lowest is because of her massive popularity amongst fanboys that's only rivaled by her massive tits.  Which are non-coincidentally directly related.

The typical Sona player has extensively more experience playing her than the average support player has playing most other supports.  Contrarily the average player has obscenely low experience playing AGAINST Sona and is unaware of the fact that she actually has the lowest damage output of the entire support class.  Worse even, most sheeple suffer from the absurd misconception of her doing damage that's being misleadingly propagandized by the abuse of artificial numbers, namely Spellblade and Echo.

Sona's (artificial)"winrate" is a result of Sona mains abusing the masses' inexperience, misinformation and bronze mentality.  The last being proven by the fact her winrate from Bronze to Diamond can fall up to 10% or more on any given day.

Sona is **THE** weakest support in the game.  This is mathematical fact.
